programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef Ep3538
programme.desc: Stylish Man The Chef is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. There are two main themes for the program, which are Big Stars Come to Cook and Five-Star Cooking Show. Stylish Man The Chef containing not only the bomb of laughter, but the audience can also gain practical cooking knowledge throughout the program.

programme.title: Battle Tour - EastvsWest Ep5
programme.desc: It is more than just a food and travel show as it is a cultural journey. The program blends travel, cuisine, and culture, inviting viewers not only to taste but also to experience the stories, people, and places behind Taiwanese food and destinations. Through lively food challenges, scenic explorations, and authentic local encounters, the hosts bring audiences closer to Taiwans diverse flavors and vibrant traditions.

programme.title: Hot Door Night Ep2068
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: The Sound of Happiness Ep178
programme.desc: Wu is a senior police officer has always wanted a son to carry his family name and join the force. However, he and wife are bequeathed with four daughters! As a doting father, his chief objective is to help them find happiness in their marriages. In this charming drama, Wu & his wife become their daughters greatest haven, through the ups and downs they face as married women.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan Ep5216
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation.

programme.title: P Storm
programme.desc: Ping reports a case of a rich man's son bribing prison guards to cover up his criminal activities in the prison to the ICAC. ICAC Chief Officer Luk goes undercover in prison to conduct his investigation. Despite the risks involved, Luk is determined to complete his mission with the help of his cell mate, Wang.

programme.title: Ready O/R Knot
programme.desc: Guy and Heidi have been together for five years since they first met in a wedding banquet, but marriage soon becomes a challenge to their relationship. Heidi sees marriage as a testimony of their love, while Guy sees it as doomsday. Can the couple resolve their conflict? Are they ready or not?

programme.title: The Hedgehog
programme.desc: Wang's odd behaviour and quirky ideas make him a social outcast. His teenage nephew Zhou, who is ashamed of his stutter, becomes Wang's only friend. Together, these misfits challenge traditional family expectations and social misunderstandings, supporting and inspiring each other as they seek their own paths in life.

programme.title: My Kung Fu Sweetheart
programme.desc: Phoenix's (Cecilia Cheung) parents are martial arts superheroes, who hide their true identities while ferreting out evil martial artists. Phoenix gets the go-ahead to train in the misty mountains, where she learns of her all-important romantic destiny...

programme.title: Love After Love
programme.desc: Directed by Ann Hui, the movie is adapted from Eileen Chang's first short story. Set in 1930s, Wei Long travels to Hong Kong from Shanghai to pursue her education. Struggling financially, she asks her aunt to help pay for tuition but ends up being her aunt's puppet to lure rich men. When Wei Long falls for playboy, George, she sinks into a life of depravity.

programme.title: The Grey Men
programme.desc: Hong Kong police officer Ah Shan goes undercover in prison to gain the trust of criminal Tian, in order to seek evidence against his gang. After their release from jail, Shan helps Tian rise within the gang and become the new boss. However, just as Shan successfully cracks down on the gang, he uncovers a shocking secret about Tian...

programme.title: The Goldfinger
programme.desc: Inspired by Hong Kong's biggest financial scandal in the 1980s, this is a rags to riches story about Ching Yat Yin who is chairman of a listed company. With Ching's wealth and influence on the rise, ICAC senior investigator Lau Kai Yuen is determined to investigate the case, even if it means spending 15 years in pursuit of the truth.

programme.title: Table for Six
programme.desc: In this comedy, three brothers reside in a home inherited from their late parents. The eldest brother insists they have dinner at home every night as a family, but tensions begin to rise when their girlfriends join in as well. Love, friendship, jealousy and complicated relationships are all on the menu for this table for six!

programme.title: Iron Kung Fu Fist
programme.desc: Liang Kun is a skilled martial arts master who left the martial arts world to protect his lover. However, his disappearance leads to her tragic death and as Liang Kun finds a way to survive in the martial arts world, he fights back to avenge his lover's death with the help of a beggar gang leader.

programme.title: Beyond The Dream
programme.desc: Primary school teacher Lok is a recovering schizophrenic who falls in love with a young girl he first met. As he struggles to reveal his illness, Lok has a relapse and becomes delusional. Little does he know she is a mental health counsellor who has a hidden agenda. The pair develops a relationship that is beyond their wildest dreams.

programme.title: In Broad Daylight
programme.desc: Based on a true event of a news investigative unit receiving a tip-off about the abuse of residents in an Elderly and Disabled Care Home. To expose the home's wrongdoings, reporter Kay goes undercover to expose the inhumanity and unveil the cruel truth under broad daylight.

programme.title: Wusong VS Ximenqing
programme.desc: Wu Song finds out about his sister-in-law's affair with a rich man, Ximen Qing. Qing sets Song up and have him exiled for a year, during which his hapless brother is murdered and cremated. When Song finally returns home, he takes the case to court but the judge brushes it aside and closes it abruptly. Can Song finally avenge his brother's death?

programme.title: High Forces
programme.desc: On its maiden flight, an A380 airliner is hijacked by armed gunmen. Among the passengers is international security expert Gao Hao Jun, whose daughter has been taken hostage, putting her life in grave danger. Determined to save her, Gao confronts the hijackers head-on. Can he rescue all the passengers and thwart the crisis?

programme.title: Shining For One Thing
programme.desc: Zhang Wan Sen plans to confess his crush on Lin Bei Xing after the college entrance exam, but an accident changes everything tragically. As Zhang feels helpless and devastated, he fortuitously travels back in time with Lin before the accident happens. Can he make amends and convey his regrets this time?

programme.title: A Murder Erased
programme.desc: Police officer Choi is assigned to a death scene investigation where the deceased body had laid undiscovered for eight years. A prosecutor joins the investigation after Choi has identified the suspect, and finds Choi's actions suspicious when all manner of inconsistencies come to light from his statement...

programme.title: Remember What I Forgot
programme.desc: Struggling with Alzheimer's disease, Hong Kong film buff Kim relies on his brother to manage their appliance repair shop. Kim's quirky behaviour prompts producer Ginger to suspect that he may be a film critic trying to profit from harsh reviews. Posing as a friend, Ginger uncovers Kim's secrets and sorrows as she gets closer to him and his family.

programme.title: Inner Senses
programme.desc: Haunted by recurring visions stemming from past traumas, Yan reaches out to psychiatrist Dr Jim to restore her sanity and overcome her troubled past. Yet, as Yan gradually heals, Jim finds himself haunted by the same disturbing images, as his suppressed memories resurface.

programme.title: Mission Milano
programme.desc: A wealthy entrepreneur goes undercover with an Interpol agent to protect a new invention, the Seed of God, from falling into an international crime conglomerate.

programme.title: MuMu
programme.desc: Mumu, a cheerful seven-year-old girl, lives with her deaf father in a deaf community and connects him to the outside world. However, their peaceful life is disrupted when her estranged mother reappears, pushing Mumu into the hearing world. Meanwhile, her father becomes ensnared by a gang that exploits the deaf to commit crimes.

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the country's energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: July Rhapsody
programme.desc: A 40-year-old high school teacher is in midlife crisis. His marriage is on the rocks and he is involved in a taboo romance with a female student who has a crush on him. Meanwhile, his wife is off to care for her dying ex-lover who shares a complicated history with the couple...

programme.title: Ah Boys to Men 2
programme.desc: Continuing from Ah Boys to Men, Ken returns to barracks, determined to change because of his bedridden father, and becomes a model recruit. However, his comrades think Ken wants to flatter and show off only, and repel him. Although Ken wants to explain, misunderstanding gets deepen through days. Can they unite and overcome the challenge together?

programme.title: The Narrow Road
programme.desc: Chak, a small cleaning company owner, hits tough times during the pandemic. In need of an assistant, he hires a young single mother Candy, who unexpectedly helps him solve many difficulties at work. While life seems to get back on track, a series of cruel realities happen again, but they still bond together to support each other on the narrow road.

programme.title: Love at First Lie
programme.desc: An ordinary, cheerful and kind-hearted girl Bao, meets a troubled rich guy Edward by chance one summer. To ruin his father's remarriage plans, Edward hires Bao and her friend to sabotage the wedding and that is how Bao and Edward meet and fall in love. All seems well for the sweet couple until their love quickly takes an unexpected turn

programme.title: Hail the Judge
programme.desc: A low level magistrate is run out of town for defending a beautiful murder suspect. Through a series of comedic events he ascends to the top rank & returns looking for revenge.

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: This is a story about two brothers. The younger brother is a drug lord while the elder brother Zhong is a police officer in the Narcotics Bureau. Both are involved in a drug cartel's turf battle and during an escort mission, Zhong discovers his brother's hidden identity. This leads to an endless battle between good and evil.

programme.title: MuMu
programme.desc: Mumu, a cheerful seven-year-old girl, lives with her deaf father in a deaf community and connects him to the outside world. However, their peaceful life is disrupted when her estranged mother reappears, pushing Mumu into the hearing world. Meanwhile, her father becomes ensnared by a gang that exploits the deaf to commit crimes.

programme.title: Sex and the Beauties
programme.desc: It is said that Hong Kong is a sexy and sexual city where life is breathtakingly fast but glamorous. Fear of marriage, single & successful psychiatrist, Selina and other beauties seek for love and happy endings.

programme.title: The White Storm 3 Heaven Or Hell
programme.desc: Hong Kong cop Billy works undercover in Suchat's drug cartel, while another undercover cop Wing successfully earns their trust in an incident and a brotherly bond is built among the three. When the police busts the syndicate, Suchat flees to the Golden Triangle with Billy and receives a tip-off about the betrayal within his circle of trust

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters' best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Burning Blood
programme.desc: Narcotics squad membersTai Hua, Lao Mi, Ah Feng, and Ah Tangare involved in arresting a drug lord. However, a betrayal within the police leads to the deaths of Ah Feng and his superior, while Ah Tang vanishes. As Tai Hua and Lao Mi uncover the truth, they find themselves torn between loyalty and betrayal in their fight against the drug cartel. .

programme.title: Tainted Love
programme.desc: Office lady Zhou Ran falls victim to an online dating love scam and is cheated of 550,000 yuan. Following faint clues left by the scammer, Zhou Ran comes to a small coastal town and encounters two young men. She gradually discovers that these two men have hidden the clues of the scam, and sets out on her revenge plan.

programme.title: The Infernal Walker
programme.desc: Ting is an undercover police who infiltrates a triad and Tuen is a triad mole being planted into the police force. While Tang is tired of being an undercover cop, Tuen wishes to quit the triad and become a real police. When the triad boss sets a trap to uncover the moles' identity, the two must fight for themselves.

programme.title: Hex vs Witchcraft
programme.desc: A compulsive gambler with bad luck owes money to a violent gangster boss and trades his wife as down payment, causing her to leave him. As he decides to kill himself, a mysterious old man offers him a proposal to marry the ghost of his dead daughter in exchange for cash and an expensive apartment.

programme.title: Descendant of the Sun
programme.desc: Shi Sheng is adopted by an old carpenter and grows up to possess extraordinary superpowers. One day, he unexpectedly discovers his identity as the son of the solar deity and learns that his power will be lost during solar eclipse. When an evil spirit appears and wreaks havoc, Shi Sheng must beat him in an ultimate duel to save the world.

programme.title: Hex after Hex
programme.desc: Hell may have no fury like a woman scorned, but hell literally, really has no wrath like a lusting ghost scorned! Cult classic director Kuei Chih-hung shoots the works with this amazing horror romance starring muscular "Venom" Lo Meng.

programme.title: Chinatown Kid
programme.desc: After getting into trouble with a local gangster, Chui Ho, in Hong Kong, Tam Dong flees to San Francisco and manages to get a job in a restaurant in Chinatown. Tam Dong finds himself embroiled with the gangsters again in San Francisco, and has to fight Chui Ho when the two meet again...

programme.title: Sex, Love and Hate
programme.desc: This masterpiece spins three interconnected tales about Hong Kong society's differing views on love and what women want from love. Follow a trio of Hong Kong women as they explore relationships and fulfil their hopes of finding true love.

programme.title: Duel Of Fist
programme.desc: Fan Ke discovers at his father's deathbed that he has a half-brother, Wenlie, in Thailand. He goes to find Wenlie, who became a boxer to support his sick mother. Following their encounter, the two got involved in the underworld of boxing match gambling.

programme.title: River of Tears
programme.desc: Retired singer Fang lives happily with her husband and son. Tragedy happens when a man from her past returns to haunt her. In an ensuing struggle to free her from his clutches, her husband dies in a car accident. Blamed by her father-in-law for her husband's death, Fang gets chased out of the house and goes back to singing to make a living...

programme.title: The Iron Buddha
programme.desc: After a notorious rapist Xiao kills his master and the entire clan, Han the last surviving disciple, decides to take revenge. He must find the legendary Hulong Blade to counter Xiao's Evil Poisonous Sword, but as Han has never seen Xiao before, he is deceived when Xiao poses as an ally to try and steal his Blade in the process.

programme.title: A Place to Call Home
programme.desc: Li Ching, star of Sweet is Revenge, plays one of three daughters, whose life is turned upside down when she discovers she is adopted. But things get even worse when she goes in search of her real mother. Finally, after what is almost a double tragedy, she realizes what so many knew all along: There's no place like home.

programme.title: Danger has Two Faces
programme.desc: Many years ago, Inspector Kam killed an innocent man and decided to resign from the police force. He became a professional killer who disguises as a pet store owner. When his best friend, Bobby begins investigating recent murder cases committed by Kam, he discovers that the mastermind behind these cases is actually his superintendent.

programme.title: Beyond the Great Wall
programme.desc: Wang Zhao Jun refuses to bribe the imperial painter, so he draws an ugly portrait of her, preventing her from being selected by the Emperor until they meet in person. The painter ends up in exile and plots for Wang to marry the Hun's warlord as a revenge. The Emperor rejects this, provoking a war which is only averted when Wang sacrifices herself.

programme.title: Moods Of Love
programme.desc: This Song Dynasty period piece about how far one would go for love (or lust) has two tales. The first involves a devilish magistrate who tries to tempt a Buddhist monk out of his self-professed celibacy by hiring a pretty prostitute. The second is the tragic tale of an exploited young girl who is forced to work in an unscrupulous couple's brothel.

programme.title: The Winged Tiger
programme.desc: If the two big villains Winged Tiger and Underworld King join forces, the martial arts world will be plunged into chaos. This evil union is set to occur with the marriage of the Underworld King's sister and the Winged Tiger. Can this dangerous duo be stopped before one says "I do"?

programme.title: The Bells of Death
programme.desc: Wei Fu is an unremarkable woodcutter. However, when psychotic marauders killed his family and abducted his sister, he goes through vigorous martial arts training with an expert swordsman in order to exact revenge on the evildoers.

programme.title: The Story of Sue San
programme.desc: TIn this Huangmei Opera romance, Wang is the son of a respected government official whereas Sue San is a famous prostitute. Although they love each other and seem to be perfectly matched, the two are worlds apart when it comes to social ranking, which will prove hard to overcome...

programme.title: King Eagle
programme.desc: A young swordman, King Eagle, unwillingly gets involved in the internal affairs of a powerful clan and becomes their target. He is saved by the female chief of the clan, Lin, and falls in love with her. However, Lin's sister is part of all evil plots and betrays her. Even so, Lin begs King Eagle not to harm her sister.

programme.title: Between Tears and Smiles
programme.desc: Fan Jia Shu is a kind-hearted student who is smitten with Shen, a heart-rending love song singer. However, he is not the only one who has eyes for Shen. The General's henchmen are also determined to present the songstress to their superior as a gift. Fan receives help from an unexpected person just in time to save the woman he loves.

programme.title: The Magic Blade
programme.desc: The movie depicts Fu Hong Xue fighting against the formidable conspirator Master Yu and seeing through his deception. The brilliantly choreographed fights, glorious settings, superb cinematography and strong casts define this movie as a highpoint in Wu Xia cinema.

programme.title: The Butterfly Chalice
programme.desc: In the Ming Dynasty, scholar Tian Yu Chuan defends a fisherman's honour but accidentally kills the governor's son, driving him into exile. Pursued to the river's edge, he is rescued by the fisherman's daughter. Amid danger, love blossoms between them, and Tian seals their bond with his family heirloom, the Butterfly Chalice.

programme.title: The Convict Killer
programme.desc: After spending fifteen years in prison on trumped-up charges for drug smuggling, the martial arts master Teng Piao embarks on a journey to take revenge on the person who sets him up - Black Leopard. Unfortunately for Piao, no one knows the real identity of Black Leopard, except that there is a black leopard tattoo on his chest.

programme.title: The Mad Monk
programme.desc: The movie consists of four stories of the Mad Monk helping others, from saving a mother and daughter from crumbling walls, to helping hawkers deal with bullies, recovering stolen money for a young man and punishing a devious court official and his son.

programme.title: The Shadow Whip
programme.desc: Three hundred thousand worth of silver is robbed by a thief using a whip as the weapon. As it is a signature weapon used by a martial arts master Shadow Whip, he is suspected and hunted. No one sees him after that. Fifteen years later, a young girl Yang shows up using the same weapon. Who is this girl and what has happened to Shadow Whip?

programme.title: Hell Has No Boundary
programme.desc: Cheng Chung (Derek Yee) and May (Liu Hsueh-hua), a pair of lovers working on the police force, camp on an outlying island. Awakened by a strange sound, May goes out onto the beach where a violent frenzy grips her. After her return from leave, May insists Inspector Wang (Yueh Hua) in a bid to rescue some hostages. She shoots the thug under most peculiar circumstances. Then a series of tragedies occur. Her two colleagues die mangled in a lift accident and Inspector Wang is injured at his desk by a snake. Wang's exorcist sister (Hsia Ping), who performs rites for him, also dies in an accident. And so does a fortune-teller who refused to read May's fortune.

programme.title: The Villains
programme.desc: Hung is an orphan seeking help from her wealthy uncle who has two sons but only dotes on the younger son Feng, a playboy. Feng covets the beauty of Hung and rapes her but when she gets pregnant, Hung is wrongfully accused and gets sent off by her uncle to protect Feng. Will Feng be punished for his villainy?

programme.title: The Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This side-splitting comedy sees naive Ah Niu headed to Hong Kong, where he is repeatedly exploited and taken advantage of, and eventually finds himself arrested and imprisoned! Can he survive difficult times and finally overcome adversity?

programme.title: Five Shaolin Masters
programme.desc: The Qing court plots to kill all Shaolin disciples by burning down Shaolin Temple. This sudden fire killed almost everyone except for five disciples. To take revenge on the Qing court, the five of them train hard in different fighting styles to become The Five Shaolin Masters.

programme.title: Invincible Enforcer
programme.desc: A young man is at the wrong place at the wrong time. As he offends a police inspector, he is thrown into jail and even when released, the police goes after him until he has no choice but to become a real criminal. Only a kind and beautiful probation officer is on his side, but can she help him?

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows...

programme.title: The Deadly Knives
programme.desc: Martial arts student Yen returns from school to defend his family homestead against Japanese financiers after his father is killed. On the way, he meets Hua and falls in love with her. However, Hua discovers that her father is plotting with the Japanese to take Yen's property and wants to murder him. It is a tough choice between family and love

programme.title: King Drummer
programme.desc: A young musician Chi Chiang is hired by the manager of a popular band when the group's drummer/leader Charlie, quits to join a rival group. The new drummer becomes an immediate hit, causing Charlie to be very jealous. Furthermore, the young drummer's mother is dead set against him having a music career.

programme.title: Vengeance
programme.desc: Yu Lou is betrayed by his wife and eventually killed by her lover, Fung, who is the boss of a martial arts school. Yu Lou's brother, Xiao Lou, knows about his tragic death and is determined to take revenge for him.

programme.title: Twinkle Twinkle Little Star
programme.desc: A beautiful but ignorant woman is abducted by aliens but nobody believes her close encounter. While planning a suicide to prove herself, she meets a failed detective who is also planning his suicide. They change their minds about dying after finding each other and start to encounter bizarre adventures, before falling in love with each other.

programme.title: Shaolin Mantis
programme.desc: The Emperor orders Feng to find proofs of Master Tian's rebellion in his house. Feng falls in love with Tian's granddaughter and marries her. When he finds the proofs and tries to leave with her, his wife is killed in the fight against Tian. Feng creates the mantis-style martial arts and vows to avenge her death.

programme.title: Forever Diamonds
programme.desc: Hua, a pretty fraud, steals a brilliant diamond ring from a shop in Hong Kong and escapes to Singapore. To smuggle the ring pass customs, Hua slips it into the pocket of a stranger, Yen, but then lost track of him. Hua finally spots Yen after searching for days and does everything to get close to him in order to take the ring back.

programme.title: The Five Venoms
programme.desc: A dying master dispatches his last pupil to track down five ex-students who are each an expert in his own lethal combat style. He fears they will steal the fortune belonging to their clan and tasks his pupil to prevent their attempt.

programme.title: Let's Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung, the son of a rich entrepreneur, meets Lian Lian, the niece of a kindergarten principal by chance. They fall into a misunderstanding on the first meeting, causing Da Yung to lose his wallet. Further misunderstanding occurs when he tries to get her to act as his fianc so as to drive away two women whom he does not like

programme.desc: A hilarious animal chase comedy about the secret life and adventures of a dog, a parrot and twin bobcats living with Ms Katkar

programme.title: The Legend Of Tarzan (2016) Ep1
programme.desc: The Legend Of Tarzan - A new live-action adventure from director David Yates (Harry Potter films) brings Edgar Rice Burroughs' legendary character back to the big screen. It's been years since the man once known as Tarzan (Alexander Skarsgard --True Blood) left the jungles of Africa behind for a gentrified life as John Clayton III, Lord Greystoke, with his beloved wife, Jane (Margot Robbie -- The Wolf of Wall Street) at his side. Now, he has been invited back to the Congo to serve as a trade emissary of Parliament, unaware that he is a pawn in a deadly convergence of greed and revenge, masterminded by the Belgian, Captain Leon Rom (Oscar winner Christoph Waltz). But those behind the murderous plot have no idea what they are about to unleash.

programme.title: XXX
programme.desc: This high-octane, action-packed espionage thrill ride stars Vin Diesel as former extreme sports athlete Xander XXX Cage, notorious for his death-defying and law-flouting public stunts. He is being scouted by National Security Agency operative Augustus Gibbons (Samuel L. Jackson) for a dangerous covert mission. Gibbons and the NSA are facing a desperate situation in distant Prague, where their undercover operative has been killed by a gang of cutting-edge thugs calling themselves Anarchy 99, headed by the brutal ex-Russian Army commander Yorgi (Marton Csokas) and his beautiful but hardened girlfriend, Yelena (Asia Argento). Agent XXX will require all of his extreme skills to combat a clever, organized and ruthless enemy far beyond the scope of his experience.

programme.title: SPIDER-MAN 2
programme.desc: The latest installment in the blockbuster Spider-Man movie series (based on the classic Marvel Comics hero) has the web-slinging superhero confronted by a formidable adversary named Dr. Otto Octavius (Alfred Molina), a scientist, better known as "Doc Ock", whose experiments go awry, mutating him into a metallic, octopus-like creature. Peter must also come to terms with his decision to dedicate his life to fighting crime as Spider-Man or give it all up to finally be with his true love, Mary Jane Watson (Kirsten Dunst), who he walked away from two years earlier.

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Under The Lovers Tree - Nico is in panic mode because Morihito has gotten quite popular at school. Even Kanshi is able to recognize Nico's feelings for Morihito, but Morihito remains as clueless as ever. However, Nico hears about a famous Lovers' Tree at Mt. Futatsu, where her class will be going on a field trip soon. According to the rumor, if two people eat lunch together under that tree, they'll become a couple. Kanshi pressures Nico to tell Morihito about her feelings.

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Kan & Nicos Channel / The Tea Ceremony Is A Piece Of Tea Cake - I heard you can easily make money. With that reason alone, Nico and Kanshi started the Kan & Nico Channel. Morihito gets irritated about how ignorant Nico and Kanshi are towards creating videos to post online, so he asks their hipster poser classmate, Keigo Magami, for help.

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Kanshi's Part-time Job Diaries ~the Superhero Show~ / Kanshi's Part-time Job Diaries ~the Side Job~ - Kanshi cried as he clung to Morihito. And that's because Kanshi immediately blew away his allowance and can't pay the monthly living expenses to the Otogi household. And so, Morihito hands him a flyer for a hero show for hire being held at Akebono Park.

programme.title: D.Gray-Man S1 Ep61

programme.desc: The Saint-girl Falls Into Darkness - Lenalee disappears once again after pushing herself and her Innocence to the limits, defeating Eshii in the process.

programme.title: D.Gray-Man S1 Ep64
programme.desc: Message - Lavi finds Lenalee encased in her Innocence, and brings her back to the ship. Miranda deactivates her Innocence, and everyone reverts to real time.

programme.title: D.Gray-Man S1 Ep65

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Under The Lovers Tree - Nico is in panic mode because Morihito has gotten quite popular at school. Even Kanshi is able to recognize Nico's feelings for Morihito, but Morihito remains as clueless as ever. However, Nico hears about a famous Lovers' Tree at Mt. Futatsu, where her class will be going on a field trip soon. According to the rumor, if two people eat lunch together under that tree, they'll become a couple. Kanshi pressures Nico to tell Morihito about her feelings.

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Kan & Nicos Channel / The Tea Ceremony Is A Piece Of Tea Cake - I heard you can easily make money. With that reason alone, Nico and Kanshi started the Kan & Nico Channel. Morihito gets irritated about how ignorant Nico and Kanshi are towards creating videos to post online, so he asks their hipster poser classmate, Keigo Magami, for help.

programme.title: Witch Watch S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Kanshi's Part-time Job Diaries ~the Superhero Show~ / Kanshi's Part-time Job Diaries ~the Side Job~ - Kanshi cried as he clung to Morihito. And that's because Kanshi immediately blew away his allowance and can't pay the monthly living expenses to the Otogi household. And so, Morihito hands him a flyer for a hero show for hire being held at Akebono Park.

programme.desc: Despite trying to keep his swashbuckling to a minimum, a threat to California's pending statehood causes the adventure-loving Alejandro de la Vega (Banderas) - and his wife, Elena (Zeta-Jones) - to take action.

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm
programme.desc: Will and Jake Grimm are travelling con-artists who encounter a genuine fairy-tale curse which requires genuine courage instead of their usual bogus exorcisms.

programme.title: Elysium
programme.desc: In the year 2154, two classes of people exist: the very wealthy, who live on a pristine man-made space station called Elysium, and the rest, who live on an overpopulated, ruined Earth.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: Before Snow White, two queens clash in The Huntsman: Winter's War. Love, betrayal, and war unfold as Huntsman Eric battles evil to save a kingdom from Ravenna's dark reign.

programme.title: Dogs in the Wild: Meet the Family S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Defending Wild Dogs - The people going to extraordinary lengths to understand and protect canids, from preventing wild dogs dying of grief in South Africa to protecting the tiny Darwin's fox.

programme.desc: Steve tries to find out if monster crocodiles can still thrive in the Reserve, and encounters five-metre-long Henry. But will he finally find the monster croc he's been searching for?

programme.title: Food Factory S6 Ep7
programme.desc: Food Factory celebrates Thanksgiving with mountains of stuffing, gluten-free pumpkin pie, turkey-shaped treats, and farm-fresh cranberry sauce.

programme.title: Food Factory S6 Ep8
programme.desc: Food Factory gears up for the best fiesta ever with chili and cheese tamales, tequila margaritas, guacamole-flavoured Guacachips, and citrus and cinnamon flavoured Mexican wedding cookies.

programme.title: Cheetah Family & Me S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Renowned wildlife film-maker Gordon Buchanan gets close to wild cheetah.

programme.title: Griff's Great American South S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Memphis - The Muddy South - Griff hits Memphis to trace the roots of blues, soul, and rock'n'roll on the banks of the Mississippi.

programme.title: Spectacular Earth S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Megawave - Nazar in Portugal is the site of the biggest ocean waves ever recorded on Earth. To understand what creates these monsters, we use specialist jet-ski cameras to ride the waves.

programme.title: Life Below Zero S12 Ep17
programme.desc: High Risk, High Reward - With the waterways open, Alaskans navigate the rivers for reconnaissance and resources. Andy Bassich and Denise Becker must endure a grueling process of launching their boats for a critical hunt.

programme.title: The Hungry Games: Alaska's Big Bear Challenge S1 Ep3
programme.desc: So Long and Thanks for All the Fish - Bundle up as an icy October storm complicates the race to the finish line. See Big Boi bounce after a stumble before tragedy hits QuadMom, and cheer as fan fave BoldFace hits her stride despite her clingy kid, Raccoon. But who will wear the crown?

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Rajan Monkey on a Mission - Rajan is the powerful alpha male who sits at the head of an unusually large troop. He has done well to sustain such a big group, but the future doesn't look so bright. There are more mouths to feed, and yet his jungle home is shrinking.

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Temple Monkeys on the Run - Nestled on the edge of the ancient city of Jodhpur, the luxurious Temple Gardens are home to a huge troop of Hanuman Langurs, who enjoy a peaceful life of bounty. But the troop has a strict hierarchy.

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Nagaina: Queen of Kings - In the hot forest of Southern India, a female King Cobra is on a mission: to find a mate, find food, and lay eggs before the monsoon arrives.

programme.title: Into The Wild India S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Path of the Matriarch - In southern India, the summer is a challenge for Asian elephants who must drink every day. As things dry up, Anura, the matriarch, leads her herd to a distant watering hole. But will she succeed in getting her 3-month-old grandson there in time?

programme.title: Land Of Primates S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Lemurs of Anja Mountain - Millions of years ago, castaway creatures were stranded on the rugged shores of Madagascar. Left to evolve on their own, they've found a way to perfectly adapt to their tropical climate. Now, see what life is like for a family of ring-tailed lemurs.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Einstein Must Go! - Get to know the Waterfront Pride: males Tom Tom and Caller, 8 lionesses, 10 youths, and Einstein, the grown cub who never left home. Watch Einstein's defiance catch up with him when rivals from the Outsiders Pride make a play that seals his fate.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Adapt Or Die - Feel the heat when the pride tries to hunt down adequate food as drought conditions push them (and their prey) dangerously close to death. Watch Einstein adapt to solo life, then assess the damage after new mom Kalwezi fights for her cubs' lives.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Contend with the challenges of the rainy season, which turns everything green and spoils the lions' camouflage. Watch Einstein fail to make new connections and weigh the pros and cons when Keeza and her cub are kidnapped by rival male Mad-Eye Moody.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Family Dynamics - Say hello to a season of plenty as flood waters recede and vast herds of prey return to the Chobe's banks. Watch Keeza and her cub make a break for it while Caller and Tom Tom brawl with their enemies, then cheer when Einstein finally finds a mate.

programme.title: Jaguar Journals S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the Jaguars - Head out into the Pantanal with Lizzie and the Onafari team on the hunt for a missing dominant male jaguar. Monitor the battle between young hopefuls, like outsider Badalo, who want to usurp his power and win over Fera and the other local females.

programme.title: Jaguar Journals S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Mum's the Word - Get to know Fera, the Queen of the Pantanal, as she teaches her rambunctious cub Simba how to climb trees and hunt for dinner. Then learn why Ferinha, another local female, struggles with motherhood as more males move in and threaten the youngsters.

programme.title: Jaguar Journals S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Collar Complications - Rejoin the team for some post-rainy-season drama as they search for Ferinha, Fera, and Badalo, whose tracking collars are missing. Meet a new biologist who helps Lizzie recollar the jaguars, adding a high-tech device that will record even more data.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Einstein Must Go! - Get to know the Waterfront Pride: males Tom Tom and Caller, 8 lionesses, 10 youths, and Einstein, the grown cub who never left home. Watch Einstein's defiance catch up with him when rivals from the Outsiders Pride make a play that seals his fate.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Adapt Or Die - Feel the heat when the pride tries to hunt down adequate food as drought conditions push them (and their prey) dangerously close to death. Watch Einstein adapt to solo life, then assess the damage after new mom Kalwezi fights for her cubs' lives.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep3

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep4

programme.title: Jaguar Journals S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Meet the Jaguars - Head out into the Pantanal with Lizzie and the Onafari team on the hunt for a missing dominant male jaguar. Monitor the battle between young hopefuls, like outsider Badalo, who want to usurp his power and win over Fera and the other local females.

programme.title: Jaguar Journals S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Mum's the Word - Get to know Fera, the Queen of the Pantanal, as she teaches her rambunctious cub Simba how to climb trees and hunt for dinner. Then learn why Ferinha, another local female, struggles with motherhood as more males move in and threaten the youngsters.

programme.title: Jaguar Journals S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Collar Complications - Rejoin the team for some post-rainy-season drama as they search for Ferinha, Fera, and Badalo, whose tracking collars are missing. Meet a new biologist who helps Lizzie recollar the jaguars, adding a high-tech device that will record even more data.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue S1 Ep5
programme.desc: A curious raccoon sticks his head a little too far into a peanut butter jar on a sweltering summer day in Toronto. See how the team gets him out of this sticky situation. Then cheer on a painted turtle who needs emergency eye surgery.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Bears on the Move - Beni and Lala are going stir crazy in the sick bay, but they must recover before returning to the rough and tumble of class. And at forest school, a termite-foraging lesson inspires class clown Valentino to make a finger-licking discovery.

programme.title: A Wild Year On Earth S1 Ep1
programme.desc: January-February - the Year Begins - In the early months of the year, the Earth's axial tilt brings the height of summer in some places and the depths of winter in others. See how life struggles to survive under these extreme conditions.

programme.title: A Wild Year On Earth S1 Ep2
programme.desc: March-April - a Time of Renewal - Travel around the globe to witness the atmospheric shifts that take place in March, from the wave of cherry blossoms that unfold across Japan to the final raft of green sea turtles that arrive on the Great Barrier Reef islands to lay eggs.

programme.title: A Wild Year On Earth S1 Ep3
programme.desc: May-June - a Time of Volatility - Watch summer unfold in the Northern Hemisphere, while regions close to the equator enter the wet season and Southern Africa goes dry, creating scarcity for some creatures and bounty for others.

programme.title: A Wild Year On Earth S1 Ep4
programme.desc: July-August - a Time of Migration - Witness some of the planet's most dramatic natural shifts in July, from the Arctic ice sheets that come crashing down during the summer melt to the feeding frenzy when sockeye salmon reach the end of their journey in Alaska.

programme.title: A Wild Year On Earth S1 Ep5
programme.desc: September-October - a Time of Activation - Travel around the world to see another seasonal change unfold. The Northern Hemisphere moves into autumn, while Australia witnesses a rebirth of life, and mating humpbacks fill the warming tropical seas of Tonga.

programme.title: A Wild Year On Earth S1 Ep6
programme.desc: November-December - Full Circle - Witness some of the most incredible natural events in November, from the millions of Monarch butterflies that converge in Mexico's forests to the deep fog that shrouds the city of Dubai, signalling the start of winter.

programme.title: Animal Empires S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Infestation - Uninvited guests. Using sheer numbers to claim a territory, some animal groups are considered pests. But their very survival may depend on finding a home where they're not welcome.

programme.title: Animal Empires S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Sanctuary - There's strength in numbers. Especially in the wild. For many species, it's the very reason why individuals come together. Protecting the empire is imperative to survival. For these animals, protection means isolation - finding sanctuary from the threats outside their boundaries.

programme.title: Animal Empires S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Migration - Epic flights, adventurous sea journeys and exhausting road trips all play a key part in the lives of many species. These empires travel in search of food, shelter or a mate. But booking and organizing travel is no easy feat when those plans involve hundreds - even thousands - of individuals.

programme.title: Coastal Africa S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Sweeping Shores - The African intertidal zone is home to a unique universe of plants and creatures. Here, life has adapted to survive in a challenging marine environment - some species are able to live on exposed rocks, while others prefer the shelter of rock pools.

programme.title: Coastal Africa S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Sanctuary of the Indian Ocean - On Africa's east coast, the warm Agulhas run south with a distinctive subtropical landscape. Made up of everything from mangrove swamps to colorful coral reefs, the area has marine turtles - who breed on long and warm sandy beaches - and a recently found population of "living fossils", the Coelacanth, which dwell in deep, submarine canyons.

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: Wade into a saltwater marsh along the Connecticut River to witness the heartwarming reunion of two ospreys who've been mates for a decade. Witness their highs and lows over a single summer as they raise their chicks and dodge a host of predators.

programme.title: Airborne S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Catching Air - Watch beginners make their first leap into the air, like an Andean condor who must attend flight school before spreading its wings. Meet oddballs who soar without feathers and marvel at a peregrine falcon's speed as it dives to catch its prey.

programme.title: Airborne S1 Ep2
programme.desc: In Flight Meals - Go hunting with flyers who excel at making mid-air catches. Watch the metamorphosis of the acrobatic emperor dragonfly, admire the barn owl's stealthy approach to prey, and catch a wandering salamander's death-defying leap into the abyss.

programme.title: Airborne S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Love in the Air - Check in with animals who are winners at the aerial mating game. Take flight with a bee crafting a custom love potion, watch a draco lizard soar to fend off rivals, and witness the graceful pas de deux that bonds a pair of Japanese cranes for life.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Earth - Travel to the ends of the Earth, where a drama is unfolding in real time. Meet animals, from tiny butterflies to huge humpback whales, that are acting as sentinels, adapting their behaviour, and helping us unlock the riddles of our changing planet.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Islands - Find out why islands are like mini-Earths where evolution happens before your eyes. Journey from the Galpagos to Antarctica to see how sea lions, finches, crickets, monkeys and other wildlife are finding surprising solutions to climatic problems.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Heat - Go to extremes, from the Sahara to the outback, where animals are teaching us how to survive in our heating world. Shelter in caves with chimps, see camels sip salt water, and listen as zebra finches sing to their eggs to make their chicks smaller.

programme.title: Osprey: Sea Raptor
programme.desc: Wade into a saltwater marsh along the Connecticut River to witness the heartwarming reunion of two ospreys who've been mates for a decade. Witness their highs and lows over a single summer as they raise their chicks and dodge a host of predators.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Islands - Find out why islands are like mini-Earths where evolution happens before your eyes. Journey from the Galpagos to Antarctica to see how sea lions, finches, crickets, monkeys and other wildlife are finding surprising solutions to climatic problems.

programme.title: Evolution Earth S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Heat - Go to extremes, from the Sahara to the outback, where animals are teaching us how to survive in our heating world. Shelter in caves with chimps, see camels sip salt water, and listen as zebra finches sing to their eggs to make their chicks smaller.

programme.title: City Wildlife Rescue S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Follow the medical and rehab teams at Toronto Wildlife Centre as they work to clear a rescued fox of mange and return it to the wild. Elsewhere in the center, meet scores of injured songbirds that have hit downtown buildings on their way south.

programme.title: Coral City S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Autumn - Adapt or perish in the coral streets as higher-than-normal temperatures make autumn cooling (and survival) more difficult. Shack up with a clownfish family and their sea anemone landlord, then see cleaner fish give manta rays a day at the spa.

programme.title: Coral City S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Winter - Get chills as winter descends, slowing down life on the bustling reef. Meander with reef sharks and octopuses, visit a coral oasis atop an old shipwreck, and spot a banded snake eel's talent for identity theft when it disguises itself as a predator.

programme.title: Pride Rules S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Hide and Seek - Contend with the challenges of the rainy season, which turns everything green and spoils the lions' camouflage. Watch Einstein fail to make new connections and weigh the pros and cons when Keeza and her cub are kidnapped by rival male Mad-Eye Moody.

programme.title: Animals At Play S1 Ep1
programme.desc: The Power of Playtime - Explore the ways that animals use play, including young gibbons in Thailand that practice falling from branches, elderly macaques that preserve their brains with playtime, and games that sharpen the profound intelligence of African elephants.

programme.title: Animals At Play S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Rules of the Game - Young hyenas compete in tug of war, mischievous parrots play at picking apart tourists' cars, and Atlantic spotted dolphins enjoy sophisticated social games amid seaweedall following specific rules that hone social bonds.

programme.title: Land Of Primates S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Lemurs of Madagascar - The island is the land of Lemurs. Lemurs are fascinating arboreal primitive primates of Madagascar represented in all sizes, colors, and shapes from the largest Indri to the tiny mouse lemur.

programme.title: Coastal Africa S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Golden Forest - This is the story of the Golden Forest, the vast expanses of kelp that lines Africa's southwestern shore. Fed by an upwelling of nutrients from deep in the Atlantic, the kelp forest nurtures four distinct worlds.

programme.title: Coral City S1 Ep3

programme.title: Airborne S1 Ep2

programme.desc: Plushythingy - When Frederic Estes creates the cutest plushy ever that is the hottest toy in town, the field team must destroy the last remaining one but are powerless against its cuteness

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Picture Perfect - Tim and Boss Baby want to bond with Dad by recreating a perfect "Dudes Weekend' camping trip, culminating in a photo opp, but everything seems to go wrong

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep25
programme.desc: The Night Lights: Part 1 - Tom and Thunder discover a baby Nightlight and must bring him back to Thunder's home realm.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep26
programme.desc: The Night Lights: Part 2 - When Thunder's clan of fellow Nightlights is attacked by the Snow Wraith, Tom vows to rescue them.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Night of the White Bone Demon - In a giant sea battle, Po and the Kids manage to escape the pursuing police to make it to Volcano island and get some answers. Empress Xiao begins learning how to defend herself.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Rise of the Empress - On the Volcano Island, Po and the Kids are reunited with Li, Grandma, Ping, Rooster, Wing, and Wong, and work together to find out what's really going on the island. Xiao becomes suspicious of some of her royal workers.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Spell - As he tries to restore the magic spell that will protect San Lorenzo, Puss accidentally brings Artephius's macram owl shop to life.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Scimitar - While searching for items missing from the treasure house, Puss enlists the help of the Scimitar, an evil sword that turns its wielder wicked.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Everest Returns - Following the events of the feature, Yi struggles to recreate her violin magic without Everest. While her mom and NaiNai prepare for the grand opening of their family dumpling shop, Yi, Jin, and Peng discover that Yi's violin has attracted a magical bird-like creature, Fenghuang, who needs their help. Yi's music also calls on Everest, who returns to join the crew and find Fenghuang a suitable home.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Welcome Home, Everest! - While Yi and the crew try to pinpoint how Yi's magic works, they notice that Everest isn't looking too hot. In fact, he's too hot. The crew tries everything to cool him down, even begging their old foe, Burnish, for help. Out of options, Yi tries to use her magic to send Everest home - until Burnish and his jerboa sidekick, Duchess, reveal that they've made over the kids' rooftop fort into a high-tech HQ, complete with various tech gadgets for the crew and a temperature-controlled chamber for Everest.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Dollhouse Defenders - When Gabby unboxes masks and capes for her and Pandy, they become the dollhouse defenders and must save the Gabby Cats from Bad Guy CatRat! In the Gabby Cat of the Day segment, Kitty Fairy sings a song about her garden magic!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Mixed-Up Dollhouse - When Gabby unboxes a snow globe shaped like the dollhouse, she notices the rooms inside are all cattywampus and in the wrong place. After a series of wacky misadventures that result in CatRat becoming a craft version of himself, Gabby figures out they need to fix the dollhouse globe to return everything back to normal.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Game Show - It's Game Show Day in the dollhouse! Our wily and well-groomed host, CatRat, leads Gabby and Pandy around the dollhouse, where they compete in Gab-ified games, like Tushy Tunes on the butt xylophone couch and a cooking competition of Bakey with Cakey. They win tickets and trade them in for prizes at the end.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Parental Stridence - When Hope oversteps by trying to teach Sandy manners, Ugga gets her revenge by challenging Hope to do the impossible: civilize Thunk.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep6
programme.desc: The Flopping of the Bullruses - Ugga has a secret - she's taking Eep to "flop with the bulrusses" - a fun and dangerous pastime Ugga enjoyed as a teen. Ugga's excitement fades when Hope invites herself and Dawn along.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Remote Control - Bored of the viewing options on window, Thunk realizes what he's been missing - real life drama! But when Thunk starts creating drama around the farm, the others set out to teach him a lesson.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep25
programme.desc: The Night Lights: Part 1 - Tom and Thunder discover a baby Nightlight and must bring him back to Thunder's home realm.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep26
programme.desc: The Night Lights: Part 2 - When Thunder's clan of fellow Nightlights is attacked by the Snow Wraith, Tom vows to rescue them.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Cold Open - Tom and the riders discover the Ice Realm and find Buzzsaw inside.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep31
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Monstrous Mayhem of the Massive Melviathan - A run-of-the-mill arts and crafts session turns into an interdimensional adventure from which Harold, George and company may never return.

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep32
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Savage Spite of the Slimy Salamangler - Krupp's campers take on rich rivals in a hoity-toity boat race that also features a revenge-obsessed giant salamander. Paging Captain Underpants!

programme.title: The Epic Tales Of Captain Underpants S2 Ep33
programme.desc: Captain Underpants and the Cunning Combat of the Covert Camoflush - The campers' splat-tastic game of paintball is rather rudely interrupted by a foul and formidable fiend known only as Camoflush.

programme.title: Spirit Riding Free S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Lucky And The Role Reversal - After Aunt Cora moves out, Lucky tries to live a life without rules.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Spirit Day - Mega Fat CEO Baby holds a game day at Baby Corp and Boss Baby must find a way to beat Mega Fat CEO Baby at his own game

programme.title: All Hail King Julien S2 Ep30
programme.desc: O Brother Where Aren't Thou? - Mort becomes jealous when King Julien's wish for a little brother finally comes true after his parents adopt a socially awkward Aye-Aye named Brodney.

programme.title: Dawn Of The Croods S1 Ep6
programme.desc: Caved And Confused - When Grug and Ugga leave the kids alone on date night, Eep throws the first-ever house party that rages out of control and almost destroys the cave.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Big Trouble in Panda Village - The kids must leave Po to escape into the forest and head back to Panda Village to prepare against Jindiao

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Adventure - Puss misses the old days adventuring with his buddy Jack Sprat. Fearful he will leave San Lorenzo, Dulcinea concocts a super special adventure surprise with the orphans. But Jack Sprat shows up with the promise of a damsel in distress who turns out to be a super scary monster.

programme.title: Dinotrux S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Ty And Revvit - Meet Ty Rux and his buddy Revvit as they join forces with the giant Dinotrux team that are half dinosaur, half construction truck and full-on fun!

programme.title: Dinotrux S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Scrapadactyls - When Revvit and his Reptool friends venture out of their ravine, the Dinotrux band together to save them from a flock of savage Scrapadactyls.

programme.title: Turbo F.a.s.t. S2 Ep27
programme.desc: The Challenge,Home On Our Own - Fed up with the rowdy FAST crew, Chet challenges them to go without racing, Skid and Shadow must defend the clubhouse alone against Clip and Clap.

programme.title: Turbo F.a.s.t. S2 Ep28
programme.desc: Mighty Snails,Silent But Deadly - Burn is forced to coach a lousy tetherball team -- and gets inspired by an old rival, White Shadow's karate skills are tested by a ninja stinkbug.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Little Trouble in Big China - It's the Lunar New Year and Odlulu has accidentally brought a stone dragon to life! Wally and Wenda work with local siblings Li and Liu, members of a dragon dance team, to tame the dragon and keep the celebration from being ruined.

programme.title: Where's Wally? S1 Ep2
programme.desc: A Day in Turkey - Wally and Wenda go to Turkey to find a sleeping rug for Arf. They meet a fellow Wanderer, Yasemin, and realize that their Turkish rug is actually a map to the Doubling Key! Odlulu and Fritz find the key first and cause chaos as the W's try to escape from the underground Cistern.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 Ep3
programme.desc: The Case Of The Runaway Train - Everyone in Toyland is ready to board Train for the 'Big Day Out', but Train runs off down the tracks without any passengers! Why did Train drive away? Noddy investigates to literally save the day.

programme.title: Noddy Toyland Detective S2 Ep4
programme.desc: The Case Of Revs Not Listening - Noddy's excitedly looking forward to his first ever go at driving Train. But then Revs starts playing up and won't listen when Noddy asks him to stop. Why is Revs not listening to him? A puzzled Noddy investigates to find out what's wrong with his friend.

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Tall Story Roary - The loudspeaker system is not working at Silver Hatch. How will Roary be stopped from performing a dangerous stunt on the track?

programme.title: Roary The Racing Car S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Car Boot Sale - Big Chris has a clear out and takes all his old junk up to Farmer Green's car boot sale but misses the clutter in Rusty. How will he get everything back?

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S2 Ep3
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Jungle Phone - When their jungle phone breaks Raa Raa and Ooo Ooo lose contact and Raa Raa thinks Ooo Ooo doesnt want to be friends any more. Luckily Topsy is able to help them find each other again.

programme.title: Raa Raa The Noisy Lion S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Raa Raa And The Zippy Zipwire - Zebby is too scared to go down the zipwire and everyone chanting loudly at her makes matters worse. Raa Raa realises the noise is putting her off and if everyone is quiet it might help Zebby.

programme.desc: Kitty Pirates - Gabby unboxes a pirate treasure map in the shape of the dollhouse (a piece of it has been torn off). This must mean it's time for a pirate treasure hunt in the dollhouse! Pirate Gabby and Pirate Pandy head out on their journey across the many lands of the dollhouse to find the Gabby Cats Treasure!

programme.desc: Lucky And The Patchwork Plan - Lucky and her friends try to prevent Aunt Cora from leaving Miradero.

programme.title: Boss Baby: Back In Business S1 Ep25
programme.desc: Research & Developments - Turtleneck wants to crack the Stinkless Serum formula and makes it a competition, pitting worker babies against worker babies, stating that the first one to the Serum will be the new CEO!

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep21
programme.desc: Cold Open - Tom and the riders discover the Ice Realm and find Buzzsaw inside.

programme.title: DRAGONS 9 REALMS S1 Ep22
programme.desc: Uncharted Territory - Alex and Eugene find themselves at odds with Tom and their fellow dragon riders when Feathers and Webmaster go missing during a blizzard in the Ice Realm.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Bridge Over Troubled Lava - The whole gang escapes pursing Guards, battles flowing lava, and survives crumbling caves and pillars to finally make it back to the Forbidden City. Xiao is ready to escape the palace, but Shi Long has other plans for her.

programme.title: Kung Fu Panda: The Paws Of Destiny S1 Ep24
programme.desc: House of Flying Pandas - The gang learns of even bigger and direr forces working against the Empress and the Kingdom of China, and must come up with a plan to put a stop to it before it is too late.

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep23
programme.desc: Stories - Artephius and the orphans are alone in town when a Celtic thunder god demands to be let into the treasure house - or he will destroy San Lorenzo!

programme.title: The Adventures Of Puss In Boots S1 Ep24
programme.desc: Sphere - A piece of treasure that belongs to the Mole King is missing, and he won't give it up unless Puss helps him reunite with his ex-girlfriend.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Sewer Koi and the Museum Heist - An earth-shaking rumble signals the arrival of a new creature, but Yi and Jin butt heads, each convinced they're the better team leader. The crew eventually discovers that the massive Sewer Koi is behind the earthquakes, but he's missing his precious pearl, the key to a magical underground dam. Without it, the sewer's water levels will rise, threatening to overflow and flood the whole city! It's going to take a heist to extract the pearl from its display at a local museum, before it's too late.

programme.title: Abominable And The Invisible City S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Peng vs. Peng - With the sudden closing of a local candy shop, NaiNai is busy trying to recreate its famous candied fruit. But after a late-night sugar binge in NaiNai's stash, Peng starts acting strangely. It turns out that he's possessed by magical creatures! The Minticon are sugar-addicted puffball creatures, who previously lived in the old candy shop. Armed with her violin, Yi commands the creatures out of Peng's body, winning over the Minticon in the process.

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Kitty Pirates - Gabby unboxes a pirate treasure map in the shape of the dollhouse (a piece of it has been torn off). This must mean it's time for a pirate treasure hunt in the dollhouse! Pirate Gabby and Pirate Pandy head out on their journey across the many lands of the dollhouse to find the Gabby Cats Treasure!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep10
programme.desc: MerCat Gets Her Sparkle Back - When Gabby unboxes beakers filled with a magical potion, they conjure up an invite for Spa Day at the dollhouse! However, while decorating for MerCat's favorite day of the year, MerCat accidentally loses her color and sparkle. Gabby and Pandy must help her get her sparkle back for the big Spa Day party!

programme.title: Gabby's Dollhouse S1 Ep11
programme.desc: Itty Bitty Blossom - The dollhouse delivery is a special plant called an Itty Bitty Blossom that goes from newborn to full-grown in one day. Gabby and Pandy have to take care of the whiny and fussy growing Itty Bitty Blossom and make sure it is in its permanent soil spot before it's fully grown.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Daddy Daughter Day - Sandy is finally old enough to join Grug and Eep for the annual Daddy Daughter Day and Grug couldn't be more excited. But when Sandy struggles to fit in with Grug and Eep's traditions, Grug has second thoughts. It isn't until Sandy goes missing that Grug realizes it's time to start a new tradition.

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep9
programme.desc: Theres No Phil in Team - When Phil humiliates himself playing throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys, the Croods band together to help him regain his confidence. Unfortunately, Phil goes from confident to cocky and bets the farm on a game of throw-go-nut with the punch monkeys. Can the Croods overcome the punch monkeys - and Phil - to save the farm?

programme.title: The Croods Family Tree S1 Ep10
programme.desc: Thunder Games - When Gran announces it's time to choose a new Thunder Sisters Queen, Ugga assumes she's got it in the bag. But after a series of challenges (the Thunder Games), it becomes clear Gran might not be ready to step down.

programme.desc: Pups Save the Wind Trekkers / Pups Save a Trophy - When Mayor Goodway and Chickaletta get trapped inside a mesa, it's up to the Paw Patrol and a little snake to rescue them. When Humdinger's mom Helga loses her son's phony trophy, the Paw Patrol have to rescue her and the trophy.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S9 Ep923
programme.desc: Pups Save Alex's Feathery Friends / Pups Save a Puffy Mayor - The Paw Patrol must rescue Mr. Porter and reunite an ostrich family before the big birds get into big trouble. During Mayor Goodway's fashion show, the Pups must save Farmer Al and Mayor Humdinger after a puffy shirt floats away with them.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep102
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Big Bike Shop / The Crew Builds A Super Tub - Rubble and the pups work to build a big bike shop in time for the Bike Festival... unless Speed Meister beats them to it! When Motor won't take a bath before their family photo, it's up to Rubble and the pups to find a construction solution.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep103
programme.desc: The Crew Builds An Ice Cream Shop / The Crew Fixes A Squeak - When a windy day derails construction on an ice cream shop, Rubble, Mix, Wheeler, and Charger are on the chase. There's a mysterious squeak in City Hall. Mayor Greatway asks Rubble and Charger to find and fix the squeak before her big speech!

programme.title: DORA S3 Ep304
programme.desc: Singin in the Tub / Show and Share - Dora and Boots help Benny gain the confidence to sing at the Canta Conmigo show. Dora helps Boots find a special Heart Banana to show everyone at Show and Share.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S2 Ep212
programme.desc: Picture Imperfect / The Fishy Friends Talent Show - Baby accidentally gets messy on family picture day, and goes to extraordinary lengths to get clean before his parents find out. Penny and Wallace team up to perform in a two-fishy talent show.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep11
programme.desc: The Cheerleading Badge - The Squirrels find Duggee's cheerleader pompoms, so he shows them his old moves. Time to practice: Duggee at the chess board, the Squirrels as a squad. There's a big match ahead...

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep12
programme.desc: The Waiting Badge - When they're accidentally shut in the shed, Duggee shows the Squirrels how to make the time pass with calm breathing and made-up games. The Squirrels cope so well. Does Duggee?

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep13
programme.desc: The Good Choices - The Squirrels haven't been making good choices round the messy clubhouse. With Duggee's help, they start to get it right. But not before sending Roly's imagination into overdrive!

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won't find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes, instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today's world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk, Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and accepted wisdom to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won't find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes, instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today's world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from Prove That Climate Change Exists to Who Will Win the Race to Space. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk, Challenging perceptions.

programme.title: The 77 Percent
programme.desc: The Impact of USAID Cuts Across Africa - This week, we examine the impact of USAID cuts across Africa. In Nigeria, reduced aid has deepened corruption and sanitation woes. Reports from South Africa, Kenya, and Nigeria reveal how each nation is coping. In South Africa, our Street Debate highlights the toll on HIV patients and healthcare workers. Lastly, we visit Ethiopia to learn how the construction industry is adapting without USAID.

programme.title: Travel
programme.desc: Nuremberg's dark past - Occasion: Nuremberg Trials 80 years ago (20.11.45): The Nazis loved Nuremberg because of its importance in the "Holy Roman Empire of the German Nation". They wanted to tie in with their ideology and used the city for their propaganda. Here they held Nazi party rallies with mass marches, filmed by director Leni Riefenstahl. The "Nuremberg Race Laws" were also promulgated here in 1935.

programme.title: Sports Life
programme.desc: One Chess Move Ahead: A Daughters Fight for Her Father - Nievevska Torres, 14, is a World School Chess champion from Peru. As she rises through the ranks, her father battles cancer and draws strength from her success. To defend her title, they must raise funds to travel. In the streets of Lima, people pay to play her, while the family sell homemade chocolates bearing her name. Together, they face lifes toughest battles one chess move at a time.

programme.title: Planet A
programme.desc: White hydrogen - White H2 could skip the whole process that hydrogen usually has to go through. You can just extract it from the ground and use it right away. White hydrogen forms when water and iron-rich rock reacts. It does not form reservoirs, but "flows up to the surface - in theory this could be seen as renewable as the formation process takes place in real time.

programme.title: Little Charo
programme.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 2-10.

programme.title: Japanology Plus mini
programme.desc: Over 70% of Japanese people are said to use eyeglasses. We visit Sabae, in Fukui, where over 90% of Japan's glasses are made, and explore the history of Japanese eyewear and the latest technology.

programme.title: A Cat's-Eye View of Japan
programme.desc: We head to Yashima, where the local boss cat leads us to a temple along the Shikoku Pilgrimage. The temple grounds are home to cats that nap, play, and greet pilgrims and other visitors.

programme.title: Rockie and Her Friends
programme.desc: Puppet action show for children. In a distant post-human future where surviving creatures have formed a community, new-breed dinosaur girl Rockie sets out on hilarious adventures with her schoolmates.

programme.desc: This show for kids promotes a greater understanding for people with difficulties and helps develop empathy. With the help of two fairies, the main character thinks about what can be done to help.

programme.desc: Strickland vs Du Plessis - UFC Middleweight Champion Sean Strickland defends his title against South African contender Dricus Du Plessis in a thrilling showdown at UFC 297. Watch the full championship fight on this episode of Main Event.

programme.title: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS
programme.desc: SERIE A TOP 10 OUTSIDE THE BOX GOALS - 10 hopeful efforts, 10 absolute beauties. Lautaro Martinez, Paolo Dybala, Hakan Calhanoglu and more from wayyy out.

programme.title: UFC Reloaded EpUFC316DevalishvilivsOMalley2
programme.desc: A championship doubleheader headlines the Octagons return to the Prudential Center in Newark, New Jersey for UFC 316 on June 7. In the main event, its a highly anticipated rematch when relentless force Merab Dvalishvili defends his bantamweight crown against the man he took it from, Suga Sean OMalley. Plus, the womens bantamweight title is on the line in the co-main event as Julianna Pea faces off with two-time Olympic gold medal winning judoka Kayla Harrison. All this and much more on UFC Reloaded.

programme.title: Mencari Ramli Musim Ke - 4 Ep12
programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini memberi peluang kepada bakat muda untuk merealisasikan impian mereka menjadi pemain bola sepak terbaik di peringkat kebangsaan dan antarabangsa. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep3
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Garcia vs. Onama
programme.desc: Prelims - The month of November opens with a return to the UFC APEX and a UFC Fight Night event headlined by streaking featherweights Steve Garcia and David Onama. Fighting out of Albuquerque, New Mexico, Garcia touches down for his first main event assignment riding a six-fight winning streak with five finishes. Not to be outdone, the 31-year-old Onama enters having won four straight, including victories over ascending prospect Gabriel Sangtos and rankings mainstay Giga Chikadze.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Garcia vs. Onama

programme.title: LIVE: UFC 322: Della Maddalena vs. Makhachev
programme.desc: Prelims - UFC superstars will dare to be great at New York Citys Madison Square Garden on November 16, as VeChain UFC 322 presents a championship doubleheader for the ages. In the main event, longtime lightweight champion Islam Makhachev makes his highly anticipated move to 170 pounds to challenge for Jack Della Maddalenas welterweight title. Plus, Chinas Zhang Weili has proven to be perhaps the greatest strawweight of all-time, but this November, she will face the sports greatest flyweight, Valentina Shevchenko, for the 125-pound crown in a long-awaited Super Fight
